body_html: Estimator does not need that. but the utility that you're using (VocabularyProcessor) is independent then Estimator. It doesn't save it's state to model-dir. it's in memory training. That's why you have the problem.
body_text: Estimator does not need that. but the utility that you're using (VocabularyProcessor) is independent then Estimator. It doesn't save it's state to model-dir. it's in memory training. That's why you have the problem.
body: Estimator does not need that. but the utility that you're using (VocabularyProcessor) is independent then Estimator. It doesn't save it's state to model-dir. it's in memory training. That's why you have the problem.
